item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, February 18, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:

20. Why I'm writing a Scheme implementation in 2025: Async Rust (164 points | 63 comments)

22. Making my debug build run 100x faster so that it is finally usable (41 points | 11 comments)
